name: JOGGERNAUT
description:
Assist the jogger by clearing his path. HE NEEDS YOUR HELP!

Use the arrow keys to select and rotate the incoming coils

Align three coils of the same type to get a power boost and reach EPIC score heights!

POST YOUR HIGH SCORE IN THE COMMENTS! CONTROLS:

Left/right: Rotate 

Up/down: Select

Enter: Retry 

Spacebar: Menu



LOW FRAMERATE ISSUES? 

Use CTRL + Mousewheel to downscale browser window size and improve performance!

MUSIC: 

Original soundtrack by Esben Nyboe: https://soundcloud.com/esbennyboe/joggernaut
